original_text: When Moses came down from Mount Sinai with the two tablets of the covenant law in his hands, he was not aware that his face was radiant because he had spoken with the Lord.
korean_text: 모세가 그 증거의 두 판을 모세의 손에 들고 시내 산에서 내려오니 그 산에서 내려올 때에 모세는 자기가 여호와와 말하였음으로 말미암아 얼굴 피부에 광채가 나나 깨닫지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: When Moses came down from Mount Sinai
with the two tablets of the covenant law in his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에 언약의 두 돌판을 들고

sentences.original_text: because he had spoken with the Lord
